spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 101,334 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Elemental Blast damage increased by 25%. Earthquake damage increased by 25%.
(4) Set: Spending Maelstrom grants you 5% increased critical strike chance and 10% increased critical damage dealt for 5 sec.
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 6.0 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.
Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that summons a Storm Elemental for 6.0 sec. Casting Ascendance always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: When you summon or extend your Storm Elemental, your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Tempest, and Lava Burst deal 30% increased damage for 8 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 75 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 695 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 118,143 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Alliance Tabard
description: A fine tabard that provides no useful combat effects, but it will let everyone know you represent the Alliance.
